title: Switch
description: Displays a form switch or a component that looks like a switch.

body.raw: ## switch Displays a form switch field or a component that looks like an switch field. ### Installation CLI Manual ```bash npx shadcn@latest add "https://designali.in/r/switch" ``` Copy and paste the following code into your project. Update the import paths to match your project setup. ### Props | Prop | Type | Description | Default | | ---- | ---- | ----------- | ------- |
